Education Secretary Michael Gove has appointed Baroness Morgan of Huyton as the new chair of Ofsted. The new chair will focus on pupil attainment, teaching and learning, leadership, behaviour and safety. I am delighted to be taking up this post. Ofsted has a crucial role to play in the drive to raise standards, especially for the disadvantaged students said Baroness Morgan in her appointment.
